title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create a payment processing system:
- Payment base class with pay() method
- CreditCard, PayPal, Bitcoin subclasses
- process_payment() function that works with any payment type
- Each payment type implements pay() differently
instructions:
Create a payment processing system:
- Payment base class with pay() method
- CreditCard, PayPal, Bitcoin subclasses
- process_payment() function that works with any payment type
- Each payment type implements pay() differently

hints.text: Each pay() method should return a string describing the payment. process_payment() should work with any Payment object.

commonMistakes.correction: Add : at the end of the line
